commands.epicfight.skill.add.failed: Unable to add this skill (skill already applied)
commands.epicfight.skill.remove.failed: Unable to remove this skill (skill does not exist)
commands.epicfight.skill.clear.failed: Target has no skills to remove
epicfight.gui.warn_already_registered: %s Warning: This item is already registered on your opponent!
epicfight.gui.tooltip_battle: Automatically registers all items with epicfight attributes.
epicfight.gui.tooltip_mining: Automatically registers all items not included in Battle Mode.
gamerule.weightPenalty: Penalty percent of attack speed by weight
gamerule.disableEntityUI: Turn off health bar and target indicator for all players
gui.epicfight.filter_animation.tooltip: Turn on/off the animated model in mining mode
gui.epicfight.health_indicator.tooltip: Turn on/off the entity's health indicator
gui.epicfight.long_press_counter.tooltip: Determines how many ticks it will take to recognize as a long press. Used for weapon innate and dodge skills
gui.epicfight.aim_helper.tooltip: Renders the aim helper while aiming a bow or crossbow, Incompatible with fabulous graphic setting and some shaders
gui.epicfight.camera_auto_switch.tooltip: Automatically switch to first/third person when toggling Mining/Battle mode
gui.epicfight.auto_preparation.tooltip: Automatically switch to the battle mode when the player's hit
gui.epicfight.auto_switching_items.toolt: Edit the list of items that will automatically switch to Battle/Mining mode
gui.epicfight.export_custom_armor.toolti: Export the all custom armor models as an resource pack
gui.epicfight.no_skills: There are no skills you've learned yet. You can learn skills by acquiring the skill books from looting mobs and chests.
item.epicfight.katana.tooltip: Sheath the katana after 5 seconds of inactivity and the next attack will be strengthened
skill.epicfight.dancing_edge.tooltip: Cut down enemies with a swordsmanship that looks like a dancing.
skill.epicfight.fatal_draw.tooltip: Draw a sword at an invisible speed and cut down enemies. If you cast while sprinting, You dash forward slicing enemies on your path.
skill.epicfight.giant_whirlwind.tooltip: Spin forward grabbing weapon in the hand and crushing the enemies.
skill.epicfight.guillotine_axe.tooltip: Heft an axe then smash it down to execute the enemy.
skill.epicfight.slaughter_stance.tooltip: Swing the spear to strike the enemies in a wide area.
skill.epicfight.lethal_slice.tooltip: Strike the enemies with the elbow and slash them. Depending on the number of enemies hit by the first strike, it slashes up to 2 times.
skill.epicfight.relentless_combo.tooltip: Blow up the target with the gatling punch.
skill.epicfight.liechtenauer.tooltip: Take a solid swordsmanship posture. You can't sprint during the skill is activated, but automatically defend against enemy attacks. Killing an enemy increases the remaining guard points by up to 4
skill.epicfight.eviscerate.tooltip: Stab the enemy and if you success to hit any target, pull the dagger out and deal critical damage
skill.epicfight.blade_rush.tooltip: Dash forward quickly and slash an enemy passing by. This skill can store the stacks up to 4 times. It has 4 combo attack moves and the last attack will be enhanced. If the enemy dies by this skill, the stack will be returned.
skill.epicfight.roll.tooltip:
Stamina: %d

Roll in the direction you're moving. While executing this skill, you will become immune to physical attacks.
skill.epicfight.step.tooltip:
Stamina: %d

Move a short distance in the direction you're moving. While executing this skill, you become immune to physical attacks.
skill.epicfight.guard.tooltip:
Stamina: depends on impact

Press the item using key to block the attacks from in front. the blocking penalty will increase when you block any attacks, consuming more stamina at next guard.

Available Weapon Types: %s
skill.epicfight.active_guard.tooltip:
The blocking penalty will be removed when you guard according to the enemy's attack timing. You are able to block ranged attacks.

Available Weapon Types: %s
skill.epicfight.energizing_guard.tooltip:
Reduces the amount of blocking penalty. You are able to block explosion, fire, magic and projectile damage sources with %s%% damage from original.

Available Weapon Types: %s
skill.epicfight.berserker.tooltip:
Get %s%% extra attack damage and %s%% extra attack speed for each 1%% of lost health.

Attack speed can't exceed 5.0
skill.epicfight.stamina_pillager.tooltip: Regen %s%% of missing stamina if you kill any entities.
skill.epicfight.swordmaster.tooltip:
Get %s%% extra attack speed.

Available Weapon Types: %s
skill.epicfight.technician.tooltip: Return stamina consumption when you dodge according to the enemy's attack timing.
